          # About Me

          # Introduction

          I am Harsh Bajpai a Computer science studnent from India and I am very excited about web ,innovation and design.

          # Interest

          My interest lies in making platforms which can have an impact on the society, i am an open source lover. I believe innovation is done at it's best when people from all domains come together and work to make a change and this is why I love open source and make most of my projects too open source so that people can come countribute and shape things in a better way

          # Hobbies

          My hobbies are guitar,travel and bit of film making.
